#converting the Rotten tamotes column to a number by Removing %
data["Rotten Tomatoes"]= data['Rotten Tomatoes'].str.replace('%',"").astype(float)

#Removing the "+" sign from age rating

data["Age"] = data["Age"].str.replace("+","")
source.ac096578: This data has various TV Shows and their ratings etc. The % from rotten tomatoes must be removed and the + from age ratings must be removed. The data has to be cleaned properly to do the proper analysis. We will try to do an overall analysis of the TV Shows and understand the trends
